title: Rory McIlroy's Top 10 Favorite Courses
headline: Rory McIlroy's Top 10 Favorite Courses
description: Rory McIlroy has teed it up at the greatest golf courses all over the world, but he's here to tell you -- in his own words -- why these 10 special tracks, like Augusta National, stand out from the crowd.
body: Rory McIlroy has teed it up at the greatest golf courses all over the world, but he's here to tell you -- in his own words -- why these 10 special tracks, like Augusta National, stand out from the crowd.
